name: HardBall III
overview: Hardball III Makes You The MVP You'll smash towering home runs, break base stealing records, pitch great games and make sensational fielding plays in the most realistic baseball game ever! And every one of your MVP hits, pitches and plays is called by Emmy award-winning Sports-caster Al Michaels. - Choose any of the 26 Big League ballparks to play in. Before the game, test your hitting skills in the practice cage, or demonstrate your power at the plate in the Homerun Derby. - VCR-like Instant Replay lets you view those close plays all over again. You can even save them to a highlight reel for later viewing. - The Player and Team Editors let you customize pitching, hitting, fielding - even the team logos. You can also create and save two complete teams. - You can play and save individual games, a complete season in progress - even the all-star game. Plus, accurate stats accumulate for all teams throughout the season.
